itemDescription: member of the Hessian princely Battenberg family and the extended British Royal Family

wikipedia_page.main: Prince Maurice Victor Donald of Battenberg , (3 October 1891 – 27 October 1914) was a member of the Hessian princely Battenberg family and the extended British Royal Family, and the youngest grandchild of Queen Victoria. He was known as Prince Maurice throughout his life, since he died before the British Royal Family relinquished their German titles during World War I and the Battenbergs changed their name to Mountbatten.
